Text:
This is what I've been waiting to hear from HIM ever since they published their last good album Deep Shadows & Brillian Highlights. Great music, works like a charm. Ville sounds better than ever and the overall sound is fantastic.
I'm going to buy this one, and you should too!
Thanks Mirore...and of course if you like this support the artists and go to the store and buy it.
I love you im totally going to buy this album when it comes to my country just to complete my collection
Thank You sooo freaking much ! Go pirates go !
